Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Ndipo pamene iwe uwaona, matupi awo amakusangalatsa ndipo pamene iwo alankhula, iwe umamvera zonena zawo. Iwo ali ngati matabwa amene aimikidwa pa chipupa. Iwo amaganiza kuti mawu onse amene amveka amanena za iwo. Iwo ndi adani kotero chenjera nawo. Matemberero a Mulungu akhale pa iwo! Kodi iwo asocheretsedwa bwanji kunjira yoyenera

Ndipo zikanenedwa kwa iwo kuti: “Bwerani kuti mwina Mtumwi wa Mulungu akupemphereni chikhululukiro kuchokera kwa Mulungu, ” iwo amabwerera m’mbuyo ndipo iwe umawaona ali kutembenuza nkhope zawo mwachipongwe
Ndi chimodzimodzi kwa iwo kaya iwe uwapemphera chikhululukiro kapena ayi Mulungu sadzawakhululukira Al Munafiqun	601 iwo. Ndithudi Mulungu satsogolera anthu ophwanya malamulo

Iwo ndiwo amene amati: “Musawapatse china chilichonse anthu amene ali ndi Mtumwi wa Mulungu kuti amuthawe.” Koma Mulungu ndiye Mwini wa chuma cha mlengalenga ndi padziko lapansi koma anthu achinyengo sadziwa zimenezi

Iwo amati: “Ngati tibwerera ku Medina, ndithudi, anthu a mphamvu, adzathamangitsa anthu kuchoka ku Mzindawo.” Koma ulemu, mphamvu ndi ulemerero ndi wa Mulungu, Mtumwi wake ndi okhulupilira koma anthu a chinyengo sadziwa chimenechi
oh inu okhulupirira! Musalole chuma kapena ana anu kuti akusokonezeni pokukumbukira Mulungu. Ndipo aliyense amene achita motero, ndithudi, ndi wotayika

Ndipo perekani kuchokera ku katundu amene takupatsani imfa isanadze pa wina wa inu kuti iye asanene kuti: “Oh Ambuye wanga! Inu mukadandibweza mwa kanthawi kochepa, ine ndikadapereka chaulere chochuluka kuchokera ku chuma changa ndikukhala mmodzi wa anthu ochita zabwino.”
Ndipo Mulungu sapereka nthawi kwa wina pamene nthawi yake itakwana. Ndipo Mulungu amadziwa chilichonse chimene mumachita
Chilichonse chili mlengalenga ndi padziko lapansi chimatamanda ndi kulemekeza Mulungu. Iye ndiye Mwini ufumu ndipo kwake ndi kuyamikidwa ndipo Iye ali ndi mphamvu pa chilichonse
Ndiye amene adakulengani inu ndipo ena a inu ndi osakhulupirira pamene ena ndi okhulupirira. Mulungu amaona zonse zimene mumachita
Iye adalenga kumwamba ndi dziko lapansi mwa chilungamo ndipo Iye adakulengani ndi kukupatsani maonekedwe abwino ndipo kwa Iye ndi kumene mudzabwerera
Iye amadziwa chilichonse chimene chili kumwamba ndi padziko lapansi ndipo amadziwa zonse zimene mumabisa ndi zimene mumaulula. Ndithudi Mulungu amadziwa bwino lomwe zinsinsi za m’mitima mwanu
Kodi inu simudamve za iwo amene sadakhulupirire kale? Ndipo iwo adalawa chilango chifukwa chosakhulupilira, ndipo chawo chidzakhala chilango chowawa kwambiri

Ichi ndi chifukwa chakuti kunadza kwa iwo Atumwi amene adali ndi zizindikiro zooneka koma iwo adati: “Kodi ife tizitsogozedwa ndi anthu anzathu?” Kotero iwo sanakhulupilire ndipo anabwerera m’mbuyo. Koma Mulungu sasowa kanthu. Ndithudi Mulungu ndi Mwini wa chilichonse ndi Mwini ulemerero wonse. Al Taghabun

Anthu osakhulupirira amaganiza kuti sadzaukitsidwa kwa akufa. Nena: “Inde! Pali Ambuye wanga! Inu, ndithudi, mudzaukitsidwa kwa akufa ndipo mudzauzidwa zimene mudachita. Zimenezo ndi za pafupi ndi Mulungu.”
Motero khulupirirani mwa Mulungu ndi mwa Mtumwi wake ndi mu Muuni umene Ife tatumiza. Ndithudi Mulungu amadziwa chilichonse chimene mumachita

Patsiku limene Iye adzakusonkhanitsani inu nonse, tsiku losonkhana, tsiku limeneli lidzakhala tsiku la mavuto ndi la mtendere kwa ena a inu. Ndipo iwo amene amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu ndipo amachita ntchito zabwino, Iye adzawakhululukira machimo awo ndipo adzawaika m’minda imene imathiriridwa ndi mitsinje yoyenda madzi pansi pake kuti akhale m’menemo mpaka kalekale. Kumeneko ndiko kupambana kwenikweni
Koma iwo amene sakhulupirira ndipo amakana ulangizi wathu, iwo adzakhala ku moto nthawi zonse omwe ndi malo oipitsitsa kukhalako
Palibe vuto limene limadza popanda chilolezo cha Mulungu ndipo aliyense amene amakhulupirira mwa Mulungu, Iye amatsogolera mtima wake ndipo Mulungu amadziwa chilichonse
Mverani Mulungu ndipo mverani Mtumwi wake. Koma ngati inu mukana, udindo wa Mtumwi wathu ndi kukuuzani uthenga wathu momveka ndi poyera
Mulungu! Kulibe Mulungu wina koma Iye yekha ndipo mwa Mulungu onse okhulupirira aike chikhulupiriro chawo

Oh inu okhulupirira! Ndithudi pakati pa akazi ndi ana anu alipo ena amene ndi adani anu, motero chenjerani! Koma ngati inu muwakhululukira ndipo simulabadira zoipa zawo, ndithudi, Mulungu ndi wokhululukira nthawi zonse ndi Mwini chisoni chosatha
Chuma chanu ndipo ana anu ndi mayesero pamene Mulungu ndiye amene ali ndi mphotho yaikulu

Kotero kwaniritsani udindo wanu kwa Mulungu ndipo muopeni Iye kwambiri. Mverani ndipo mumvere. Ndipo perekani chopereka chaulere. Chimenecho ndi chabwino kwa inu. Ndipo aliyense amene asiya umbombo adzakhala wopambana
Ngati mukongoza Mulungu ngongole yabwino, Iye adzaichulukitsa ndipo adzakukhululukirani machimo anu. Ndipo Mulungu ndi wokonzeka kuyamika ndi kulipira ndipo ndi wopilira kwambiri
Wodziwa zonse zobisika ndi zooneka ndipo ndiye Mwini mphamvu zonse ndi Mwini nzeru zonse
